actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 103-94.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 139.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Lands Cleanup Act of 1985 to rename Federal Lands Cleanup Day as Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, and for other purposes.
